name: Thomas Assessments
description: Thomas Assessments believe that work should feel meaningful. For that to happen, effective interactions are essential, so we're transforming how people work together by equipping them with greater insights on an intuitive platform that's getting smarter every day. Thomas dedicated to helping everyone become their very best selves at work. Thomas transforms the performance of organisations around the world by equipping individuals with a greater understanding of themselves. Its team interaction optimisation (TIO) platform, powered by proven assessments and data science, improves recruitment and development decisions and optimises everyday interactions. Founded in 1981, Thomas empowers millions of people across 140 countries every year to feel more fulfilled, build stronger connections and prosper in role.
features: Registered with the British Psychological Society
business_objectives: Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Headline: Recruit. Retain. Relax.
ShortDescription: The world is changing, and traditional recruitment and development methods are not working. The Thomas platform equips you with the tools you need to recruit the best talent, and by using unique personal insights you’ll develop your people to create high performing teams. It’s time to embrace the future of recruitment and development.

Highlights.name: Engage
Highlights.description: By leveraging an employee psychometric test, levels of engagement can be established within your organization. Easily identify actions to enhance employee wellbeing, motivation and productivity.

Highlights.name: 360 Degree Feedback
Highlights.description: The Thomas 360 quickly and easily enables people to gather performance feedback from their managers, colleagues, team members and customers and then compare this feedback with their own perception of their performance.

Highlights.name: Workplace Personality
Highlights.description: The Behavior assessment (PPA) provides a rapid and deep insights into a person's behavioral preferences and communication style.

enhanced_description: Thomas Assessments provides an intuitive, data science-powered platform designed to transform organizational performance by optimizing team interactions and improving recruitment and development decisions. Founded in 1981, the company empowers millions of people across 140 countries annually to enhance self-understanding, build stronger connections, and achieve professional fulfillment. The platform addresses the evolving landscape of recruitment and development by equipping organizations with tools to recruit top talent and cultivate high-performing teams through unique personal insights. Its core offerings include recruitment assessment tests, a 360-degree feedback system, and psychometric tests that provide deep insights into workplace personality, behavioral preferences, communication styles, and employee engagement levels.
